{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Green chaos serpent left arm | class = Demon1Chunk2 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon1Chunk2
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon1|green chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon1Chunk2 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DEMB A 4 DEMB A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DEMB A 20 Wait Death: DEMB A -1 Stop } }
